section.title: Types of Charts Provided by Anyframe
section.para: For xml data to be easily generated, JAXB Model java class is provided for the most frequently used five types of graphs/charts currently provided by FusionChart Free utilizing the OXM technology. Currently, FusionChart linkage provided by Anyframe is limited, but the chart types requested frequently by users (e.g. multi-series chart) will be further complemented.

listitem.para: Column 2D + Line - column and line graph

section.para: Since Anyframe does not currently support all properties provided by FusionChart Free, the JAXB Model class provided can be referred to and be extended or redefined for use when necessary. For reference, Trang was executed for JAXB Model classes based on XML data samples found in FusionChart Free documentation, and XSD schema was generated, which was again used to generate java class type through maven-jaxb2-plugin, and some faulty properties were customized.

listitem.para: Following is part of the chart-servlet.xml file.

para.programlisting:
<!-- marshallingView related addition --> <bean id="utilMarshallingView" class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.xml.MarshallingView"> <property name="marshaller" ref="utilMarshaller" /> </bean>
<oxm:jaxb2-marshaller id="utilMarshaller"> <oxm:class-to-be-bound name="org.anyframe.chart.fusionchartfree.support.model.pie2d.Pie2dGraph" /> <oxm:class-to-be-bound name="org.anyframe.chart.fusionchartfree.support.model.stackedbar2d.StackedBar2dGraph" /> </oxm:jaxb2-marshaller>
